page.title: 17 A Day In The Life Of
page.content: I woke up at 6.32 and at 6.46 I decided to listen to my radio cassette recorder. At 7.10 my dad made the tea and brought it upstairs with a biscuit for me, my sister, my mum and my dad.I laid the table at 7.30 and then went upstairs to get washed. When I had dressed it was 7.44. After that I went downstairs and had my breakfast.At 8.18 we read the Bible as a family.At 8.30 I went out to catch the bus.At 8.50 I arrived at school. At 9.22 we got on the bus to go to Tiverton for swimming.At 11.30 we got back and started our work. At 12.00 I sat down for dinner. At 13.15 we started to read quietly and at 14.30 we went out. At 15.00 we came in and cleared up and sat down. We had a book read to us. At 15.30 I went home and had my tea. I went out at 19.25 and at 21.00 I came in and went to bed.
